research_municipality_step.notes: The City of Hudson, TX operates under a mayor-council government type. There was conflicting information regarding the current Mayor. One source from the official city website explicitly states 'Current Mayor Robert Smith', while another section on the same website lists 'Mayor Terry Taliaferro - 2026'. Based on the explicit statement of 'Current Mayor Robert Smith', he has been listed as Mayor. Council members and their terms were gathered from the official city website, with recent election results confirming some council members' terms for 2025-2027.
